statements: SELECT * FROM IncidentResponseData;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, reported_by FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_description FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE resolution_status = 0;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, resolution_status FROM IncidentResponseData ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, report_date FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE resolution_status = True ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, reported_by FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE incident_type = 'Phishing Attack' AND report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM IncidentResponseData GROUP BY reported_by HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY incident_count DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM IncidentResponseData WHERE resolution_status = False AND (incident_type = 'Data Leak' OR incident_type = 'Ransomware');
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire';
SELECT incident_id, severity FROM incidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM incident_comments GROUP BY incident_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, status FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM incident_comments JOIN incidents ON incident_comments.incident_id = incidents.incident_id WHERE incident_type LIKE '%fire%' AND status = 'Open';

SELECT incident_id, incident_type, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM incidents LEFT JOIN incident_comments ON incidents.incident_id = incident_comments.incident_id GROUP BY incident_id HAVING comment_count > 0 ORDER BY comment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT reported_by, incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type='Accident';
SELECT * FROM incident_participants WHERE participant_role='Witness' ORDER BY participant_name ASC, incident_id DESC;
SELECT action_description, action_date, action_taken_by FROM incident_actions WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS num_participants FROM incident_participants GROUP BY incident_id HAVING num_participants > 2;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT incident_id, reported_by, incident_description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;

SELECT i.incident_id, p.participant_name, p.participant_role, i.incident_description FROM incident_reports i JOIN incident_participants p ON i.incident_id = p.incident_id WHERE p.participant_role = 'Witness' ORDER BY i.incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_participants WHERE incident_id IN (SELECT incident_id FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Vandalism');

SELECT a.action_id, a.action_date, a.action_taken_by, r.reported_by FROM incident_actions a JOIN incident_reports r ON a.incident_id = r.incident_id WHERE a.action_date BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM incident;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incident WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM affected_systems WHERE system_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT responder_name, role FROM responders ORDER BY responder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM actions_taken WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT * FROM incident;
SELECT incident_id, description, severity FROM incident;
SELECT * FROM affected_systems WHERE status = 'resolved';
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM affected_systems ORDER BY system_type ASC;
SELECT responder_name, role FROM responders WHERE incident_id = '1234-5678';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT title, description, severity FROM incidents WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT incident_id, title, status FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT reported_by, reported_at FROM incidents ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_comments WHERE commented_by = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_id, title, description, reported_by FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY reported_at ASC;

SELECT i.title, i.severity, ic.comment_text, ic.commented_by FROM incidents i JOIN incident_comments ic ON i.incident_id = ic.incident_id WHERE ic.commented_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ic.commented_at DESC;
SELECT ia.assignee_name, ia.assignee_email, il.log_type, il.log_message FROM incident_assignees ia JOIN incident_logs il ON ia.incident_id = il.incident_id ORDER BY il.logged_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM incident_attachments WHERE uploaded_by = 'Alice' AND uploaded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
